resources.string: Earlier I\'ve Subscribed to receive this SMS
Add or Edit your phone numbers
Mark confirmations from service as read
Hide messages from people of your contact list
Show confirmation dialog before sending a report
Your E-mail is «%s». You can set it via Settings.
It\'s necessary to add your current Phone Number. If you are using more than one SIM-card then add several Phone Numbers.
It\'s necessary to add your Phone Number manually.
It\'s necessary to set your E-mail manually to get results of unsubscribing.
E-mail is invalid. Please try to reenter.
Invalid Phone Number. Only Russian mobile phone numbers are supported. Example: 71234567890

SMSnomore is a social service made for unsubscribing from advertising SMS-mailings. Service holder is ZAO «Vendosoft». Terms and Conditions of the Service: http://www.smsnenado.ru/agreement.html\nThis Software licensed under the terms of BSD-2 license: https://github.com/sbar/smsnenado/blob/master/COPYING
One of this spammer\'s messages has already marked as the spam. Messages from this address automatically will be marked as a spam.
This message will be sent for processing. Internet connection is needed
This message has been sent for processing. You\'ll receive the result via e-mail.
You\'ve unsubscribed successfully from this spam address. New messages should not arrive. If you will receive any message from this address it will be automatically marked as a spam.
FAS reporting guide has been sent to your E-mail. Please check it out.
Unsubscribing guide for this spammer address has been sent to your E-mail. Please check it out.
The issue has been sent to FAS.
Messages from the selected sender ain\'t spam anymore.
Created a report for this message.
Created a report for this message. Need internet connection to continue.
Only once a week you can send a report for one sender

- Added SMS removal after creating report feature
- Fixed incorrect report creating issue in a complicated case
- Fixed other bugs
- Added a banner to reporting screen
Cannot create a report for address «%s». Error %d: «%s». Check the application\'s settings and try again.
Remove all Messages of this Sender
